des: "Made with everything BUT the kitchen sink!  Kids like this one, and they like the name!  This recipe makes a lot; use as your 'house dressing'.  If you don't have red wine vinegar, distilled white vinegar will do."
ins: In a blender, combine oil, tomato soup, brown sugar,  wine or white vinegar, dry mustard, garlic salt, onion salt, celery salt, Worcestershire sauce, paprika, hot sauce, and mayonnaise. Cover, and blend on low speed.  Increase speed, and blend until thoroughly mixed.  Refrigerate, covered, until ready to use.
